refactoringOperationDescriptor.name: Resize svg
refactoringOperationDescriptor.description: Refactoring operation to resize an svg image.

parameters.description: Input a new width or height in the unit of your choice. By default the svg will keep the original unit. Select "enforce" to perform a resizing with unit conversion (using the chosen resolution). Leave the value empty for a simple conversion.

parameter.name: resolution
parameter.label: Resolution
parameter.description: Enter the desired ouput resolution in dots per inch (dpi). The resolution will be used to convert pixels into a metric dimension.

parameter.name: enforce
parameter.label: Enforce Unit
parameter.description: Check to convert the svg to the input unit.

parameter.name: redim-text
parameter.label: Resize images with text
parameter.description: Check to include images that contain text.
